name: Oik 3
description:
Casual physics puzzle. The player's goal to keep the blue block on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.

- 60 levels
- 600+ Achievements
- Relax music

Oik 3 - Puzzle in the style of Zup!

Credits

"Oik 3" powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5

Music: "Centuries Back" - Anders Baldwin & Brady Hoffman & Alice Shelton & Luke Barker & Ruby Terry
